version_description:
- New infantry weapons (m3, PPSh, MG42, DP28)
- Small multiplayer fix
- New Chinese and Italian generals

- Paintbrush size for map editor
- 10 new countries
- Almanac for troop bonuses and terrain
- Snow terrain
- Various tweaks

- New languages support
- Faster map loading
- New countries

- New option in map editor to add a general speaking at the beginning of a mission
- Fixed bug where generals didn't appear properly

- French and English troop skins
- Beginning dialogue changes

- Fixed introduction bug
- Added generals
- Added countries

- Minor fixes to save system and bugs
- Option to let AI control the game for custom missions (Drew Durnil mode, turn on by finishing the round)

- Internal changes
- More content will be coming soon after

- Railways, villages, factories! New terrains that resemble the countryside outside of cities. Villages and factories provide manpower/industry and can heal the respective units stationed on them. Railways have a movement cost of 1, three times less than the plains tile, meaning even the slowest of units can be quickly moved to and fro the frontlines.
- Diplomacy: you can now declare war on neutral countries and even betray your allies! Beware that betrayal comes with certain penalties. You can also give your allies resources like the way lend lease worked.
- Map reupload: maps can now be set to public (allowing reuploads). The issue with special characters in events preventing download should be mostly fixed, but please contact me at discord or email if the problem persists.

- Advertisement and privacy changes
- Fixed a small bug with diplomacy menu

- Recreated all conquest maps (Europe and Asia 1937-1943)
- Lots of optimisations and small changes

- Changed generals: one unit per general, but regardless of how big the unit is; generals now also boost the health of garrisoned unit
- Small bug fixes

- Added sound for buttons, events, and troop movements
- Added a few generals from Asian countries and Germany
- Tutorial and conquest bug fixes

- Opened map will be marked
- Movement cost now greater for certain vehicles in terrains
- Lock units to make them stay in place

- Fixed problem where a map isnâ€™t saved if you download it and the game is shut down
- Fixed bug where a general is hidden in the shop
- Fixed bug where maps with quotation marks in text have trouble being opened
- Added city trigger for events
- Removed community highlights
